overview_of_class: A contemporary course covering the diverse field of inorganic chemistry including all the elements of the periodic table. Topics include current concepts and models of chemical bonding, reactivity, structure, and properties of inorganic compounds.
name: Inorganic Chemistry
title: WCAS CHEM 333-0-01 Inorganic Chemistry

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: A contemporary course covering the diverse field of inorganic chemistry including all the elements of the periodic table. Topics include current concepts and models of chemical bonding, reactivity, structure, and properties of inorganic compounds.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisite: Two units of 200 or 300 level chemistry.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. "Inorganic Chemistry", Miessler and Tarr, 5th edition, 2013 ($243.40 new; $182.55 used)*
2. "Molecular Symmetry and Group Theory," Alan Vincent, 2nd edition, 2001 ($53.70 new; $40.30 used)*

*Prices as listed by the Norris Bookstore on 6/23/16. Prices offered by other vendors may be lower.

subject: CHEM
